entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
